function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction of physical activity levels linked to worse psychological well-being","Impact":"Increased risk of mental disorders, depression, and anxiety","Mitigation":"Encouraging regular exercise, promoting physical activity through community programs","Technologies":"Fitness apps, online workout platforms, wearable fitness trackers","People":"Individuals with reduced physical activity levels","Owner":"Community health organizations, fitness professionals"},{"Description":"Gender disparity in the correlation between physical activity reduction and psychological well-being","Impact":"Potential exacerbation of mental health issues in the female group","Mitigation":"Targeted interventions to promote physical activity among females, addressing gender-specific barriers to exercise","Technologies":"Social media campaigns, targeted fitness programs for females, online support groups","People":"Females at risk of reduced mental well-being due to physical inactivity","Owner":"Public health organizations, gender-specific fitness initiatives"}]}
